description.name: 16A IP44 rubber plug
description.long_desc:
Rubber Power Plug 230V 16A IP44 – Solid, Durable, and Resistant!


A solid and reliable 16A IP44 rubber power plug is the perfect solution for both indoor and outdoor applications. Its durable rubber housing offers increased resistance to mechanical damage, moisture, and dust, making it indispensable in workshops, on construction sites, in gardens, and anywhere else where safety and durability matter.


Technical Specifications:




  • Plug type: E/F




  • Power supply: 230V~




  • Rated current: 16A




  • Protection rating: IP44 – splash- and dust-resistant




  • Material: High-quality technical rubber




  • Color: Black




  • Certificates: CE




Key Features:




  • Easy Installation – Simple design allows for quick and hassle-free cable connection.




  • IP44 Resistance – Suitable for tough conditions, protecting the installation from water and dust.




  • Safety – Sturdy contacts and secure cable mounting ensure long-lasting and fault-free operation.




  • Versatility – Compatible with most European E and F type sockets.




Applications:




  • Workshop and garden extension cords




  • Electrical devices in harsh environments




  • Construction and industrial equipment




  • Temporary installations (e.g., events, trade shows)

description.name: 16A IP44 rubber socket
description.long_desc:
Rubber Power Socket 230V 16A IP44 with Cover – Durable, Safe, and Resistant!


The robust 16A IP44 rubber power socket with protective cover is a reliable solution for both outdoor and indoor use. Its damage-resistant rubber housing and built-in protective flap ensure a high level of safety even in harsh weather conditions.


Technical Specifications:




  • Socket type: E/F




  • Power supply: 230V~




  • Rated current: 16A




  • Protection rating: IP44 – resistant to splashes and dust




  • Protective closing flap




  • Material: Durable technical rubber




  • Color: Black




  • Certificates: CE




Product Features:




  • IP44 Protection – Shields against dust and water splashes, ideal for gardens, garages, or construction sites.




  • Rubber, non-slip housing – Resistant to impact and abrasion.




  • Protective Flap – Automatically closes when the plug is removed, protecting the socket from dirt and moisture.




  • Stable Connection – Strong contacts and a solid interior provide a reliable connection with the plug.




Applications:




  • Gardens and allotments




  • Workshops and production halls




  • Construction sites




  • Garages and yards




  • Outdoor events

category.name: M14 Diamond Hole Saws
category.path: Cutting Tools\Diamond Tools\M14 Diamond Hole Saws

category_idosell.path: Cutting Tools\Diamond Tools\M14 Diamond Hole Saws

description.name: Diamond drill 6mm M14
description.long_desc:
A diamond hole saw is a tool designed for precise drilling in exceptionally hard materials such as glazed porcelain stoneware, technical porcelain, ceramics, and clinker. Thanks to the use of high-quality diamond grit, the hole saw offers excellent performance and long service life, even under intensive use. The hole saw is additionally filled with wax, which absorbs heat from the core during drilling.


Equipped with an M14 thread, it fits most angle grinders available on the market, eliminating the need for additional adapters. Its versatility allows it to be used both wet (with water cooling) and dry, depending on the task requirements.


Technical Specifications:




  • Type: Diamond hole saw for ceramic, porcelain stoneware, and stone




  • Working Diameter: 6 mm




  • Mounting: M14 (fits angle grinders)




  • Operating Mode: Wet and dry use




Key Product Features:




  • High-Quality Diamond Grit
    Ensures exceptional durability and drilling efficiency even in the hardest materials, such as porcelain stoneware, ceramic tiles, granite, or marble.




  • Versatile Use – Wet and Dry Operation
    Its design makes it suitable for both water-cooled and dry drilling – offering full flexibility in various working conditions.




  • M14 Mounting
    The standard thread allows for quick attachment to common angle grinders without the need for extra adapters.




  • Chip-Free Precision Drilling
    Ideal for creating installation holes for outlets, brackets, bathroom fixtures, etc.





Would you like this in a more marketing-style format or kept technical?

A diamond hole saw is a tool designed for precise drilling in exceptionally hard materials such as glazed porcelain stoneware, technical porcelain, ceramics, and clinker. Thanks to the use of high-quality diamond grit, the hole saw offers excellent performance and long service life, even under intensive use.


Equipped with an M14 thread, it fits most angle grinders available on the market, eliminating the need for additional adapters. Its versatility allows it to be used both wet (with water cooling) and dry, depending on the task requirements.


Technical Specifications:




  • Type: Diamond hole saw for ceramic, porcelain stoneware, and stone




  • Working Diameter: 45 mm




  • Mounting: M14 (fits angle grinders)




  • Operating Mode: Wet and dry use




Key Product Features:




  • High-Quality Diamond Grit
    Ensures exceptional durability and drilling efficiency even in the hardest materials, such as porcelain stoneware, ceramic tiles, granite, or marble.




  • Versatile Use – Wet and Dry Operation
    Its design makes it suitable for both water-cooled and dry drilling – offering full flexibility in various working conditions.




  • M14 Mounting
    The standard thread allows for quick attachment to common angle grinders without the need for extra adapters.




  • Chip-Free Precision Drilling
    Ideal for creating installation holes for outlets, brackets, bathroom fixtures, etc.





Would you like this in a more marketing-style format or kept technical?

description.name: Air compressor 4000mAh 84W
description.long_desc:
The modern mini bike/car compressor is a compact and highly practical device combining a tire inflator, power bank functionality, and a built-in LED flashlight. Thanks to its sturdy construction, intuitive operation, and large 4000mAh battery capacity, it is the perfect companion for travel, camping, and everyday use.


The device enables inflation of car, bike, and motorcycle tires, as well as balls and air mattresses. Equipped with an LED display, it allows for precise pressure readings in various units: PSI, BAR, KPA, KG/CM². The automatic shut-off feature upon reaching the selected pressure ensures both convenience and safety during use.


Technical Specification:




  • Maximum pressure: 150 PSI / 10.34 BAR




  • Battery capacity: 4000mAh




  • Operating voltage: 7.4V / DC 12V




  • Charging voltage: 5V (USB-C)




  • Maximum power consumption: 84W




  • Maximum current: ≤8A




  • Maximum airflow: 25L/min




  • Measurement accuracy: ±0.5 PSI




  • Measurement units: PSI, BAR, KPA, KG/CM²




  • Operating temperature: -20°C to 60°C




  • Air hose length: 170 mm




Key Features:




  • Maximum inflation pressure: 150 PSI – ideal for cars, bicycles, motorcycles, and balls.




  • Large 4000mAh battery capacity – long operating time and can also function as a power bank (charging devices via USB).




  • High performance: 25L/min airflow – for fast and efficient inflation.




  • Built-in LED flashlight with 3 modes – standard light, flashing emergency light, and SOS mode.




  • Automatic shut-off function – stops inflation when the set pressure is reached.




  • Precise measurement accuracy ±0.5 PSI – ensures safe use.




  • Multi-functional USB port – for charging smartphones and other mobile devices.




  • Charging via USB-C or 12V car cigarette lighter socket.




  • Durable construction and compact size – ideal for storage in the trunk or backpack.




  • Wide operating temperature range: from -20°C to 60°C.




Set Contents:




  • Bike/Car Air Compressor




  • USB-C charging cable




  • 12V power cable (car cigarette lighter)




  • Set of adapters (for mattresses, balls, bicycles, etc.)




  • Spare fuse




  • Carrying pouch




  • User manual




  • Original packaging

description.name: Cable wire hydraulic crimping tool 4-70mm2
description.long_desc:
The hydraulic crimping tool is an efficient and reliable device designed for the precise crimping of cable terminals onto wires with cross-sections ranging from 4 mm² to 70 mm². Thanks to hydraulic technology, the user can easily achieve high pressing force with minimal effort.


An ideal solution for professional electricians, installers, and DIY enthusiasts who value convenience and secure wire connections.


Key Features




  • Wide working range: from 4 mm² to 70 mm² – versatile applications.




  • High crimping force: hydraulic drive ensures perfectly durable connections.




  • Robust construction: made from high-quality materials for long service life.




  • Interchangeable dies: 14 pieces, adapted for different wire diameters (4, 6, 10, 16, 25, 35, 50, 70 mm²).




  • Handy carrying case: practical storage and easy transport of the tool and accessories.




  • Convenient operation: ergonomic handle provides comfort even during prolonged use.




  • Precision valve: ON/OFF function for easy oil flow control and quick piston return.




Set Includes




  • Hydraulic Crimping Tool




  • 14 interchangeable crimping dies (double sets for various sizes)




  • Complete set of O-ring seals




  • Sturdy transport case




Technical Specifications


Working range: 4 mm² – 70 mm²


Crimping force: up to 6 tons


Drive type: Manual hydraulic


Material: Steel


Die handling: Quick-change system


Carrying case: Included

  • High crimping force: hydraulic drive ensures perfectly durable connections.




  • Robust construction: made from high-quality materials for long service life.




  • Interchangeable dies: 14 pieces, adapted for different wire diameters (4, 6, 10, 16, 25, 35, 50, 70 mm²).




  • Handy carrying case: practical storage and easy transport of the tool and accessories.




  • Convenient operation: ergonomic handle provides comfort even during prolonged use.




  • Precision valve: ON/OFF function for easy oil flow control and quick piston return.




Set Includes




  • Hydraulic Crimping Tool




  • 14 interchangeable crimping dies (double sets for various sizes)




  • Complete set of O-ring seals




  • Sturdy transport case




Technical Specifications


Working range: 4 mm² – 70 mm²


Crimping force: up to 6 tons


Drive type: Manual hydraulic


Material: Steel


Die handling: Quick-change system


Carrying case: Included

description.name: 20mm wheelbarrow handle
description.long_desc:
Designed for mounting on the grips of transport trolleys, wheelbarrows, garden carts, and other hand tools with a 20 mm diameter. Made from high-quality plastic with increased resistance to weather conditions and heavy use. Equipped with non-slip protrusions that ensure a secure grip and comfortable operation, even when wearing gloves or with wet hands.


Technical Specifications:




  • Inner diameter: 20 mm




  • Total length: approx. 97 mm




  • Material: technical rubber (PVC/elastomer)




  • Color: black




Product Features:




  • Wear-resistant material: flexible plastic (technical rubber) resistant to moisture and temperature.




  • Ergonomic design: raised ribs provide a stable and comfortable grip.




  • Safe to use: collar prevents the hand from slipping off.




  • Easy installation: simply slide it onto the handle tube – optionally, glue or a locking screw can be used.




Applications:




  • Transport trolleys




  • Construction and garden wheelbarrows




  • Manual warehouse carts




  • Other devices and tools with a 20 mm handle diameter

description.name: Angle grinder 125mm 900W with power adjustment
description.long_desc:
The 125mm angle grinder is a reliable tool designed for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value performance, comfort, and work safety. Equipped with a powerful 900W motor and copper winding, it ensures durability and trouble-free operation even under intensive use.


Thanks to the 6-speed adjustment ranging from 3000 to 12000 RPM, the device excels in a variety of applications – from precise grinding to rapid cutting of hard materials.


Technical Specification:


Motor power: 900W


Power supply: 230V~50Hz


Disc diameter: 125 mm


Speed range: 3000–12000 RPM


Spindle thread: M14


Speed adjustment: Yes (6-speed)


Motor winding: Copper


Key Features:




  • Supported disc diameter: 125 mm – ideal for most grinding and cutting applications.




  • Powerful 900W motor – provides high performance and long service life.




  • 6-speed adjustment (3000–12000 RPM) – adjust the speed to match the material being worked on.




  • Copper motor winding – ensures better electrical conductivity and durability.




  • Ergonomic side handle – guarantees stability and comfort even during long working sessions.




  • Included spare carbon brushes – extend the lifespan of the device.




  • Robust housing – impact-resistant body made of durable materials.




Set Contents:




  • Angle grinder




  • Disc guard




  • Wrench for disc and guard installation




  • Spare carbon brushes




  • User manual




  • Original packaging

description.name: Angle grinder 230mm 2100W
description.long_desc:
The 230mm angle grinder is a reliable tool designed for demanding users who expect high power, working comfort, and robust construction. Equipped with a powerful 2100W motor and copper winding, it guarantees maximum durability and efficiency even under the toughest conditions.


Thanks to the 180° rotating handle, the device easily adapts to different working positions, significantly enhancing comfort and control during cutting or grinding operations.


Technical Specification:




  • Motor power: 2100W




  • Power supply: 230V~50Hz




  • Disc diameter: 230 mm




  • No-load speed: 6500 RPM




  • Spindle thread: M14




  • Rotating handle: 180°




  • Motor winding: Copper




Key Features:



  • Supported disc diameter: 230 mm – ideal for cutting large and thick materials.

  • Powerful 2100W motor – ensures smooth and efficient operation even under heavy loads.

  • Copper motor winding – guarantees better conductivity and extends the device’s lifespan.

  • 180° rotating handle – allows convenient adjustment of the grip position depending on the task.

  • Ergonomic side handle – provides stable and secure handling in any working position.

  • Included spare carbon brushes – prolong the tool’s durability.

  • Solid and durable construction – resistant to intensive use.


Set Contents:



  • Angle grinder

  • Disc guard

  • Side handle

  • Wrench for disc and guard installation

  • Spare carbon brushes

  • User manual

  • Original packaging

Left handlebar for brush cutter
description.long_desc:
The left handle for a petrol brush cutter is an essential component for any user who values comfort and precision during work. Made from high-quality materials, it ensures durability and resistance to intensive use. The ergonomic grip and non-slip surface provide a secure hold, resulting in better control over the device and increased safety during operation.


Product Features:



  • High-quality construction – a sturdy design ensures durability and user comfort.

  • Comfortable grip – an ergonomic handle covered with a non-slip material guarantees a firm hold and better control over the device.

  • Universal fit, 19mm tube diameter – compatible with most petrol brush cutters.

  • Improved work ergonomics – the optimally shaped handle reduces fatigue during prolonged mowing sessions.


Technical Specifications:



  • Tube diameter: 19 mm

  • Material: Aluminum tube + plastic

  • Purpose: Left handle for petrol brush cutters

description.name: Right handlebar with switch for brush cutter
description.long_desc:
The right handle for a petrol brush cutter with a switch and throttle lever is an essential component of any petrol brush cutter. Thanks to its ergonomic design and non-slip grip, it ensures a secure hold even during intensive work. The built-in ON/OFF switch allows for quick device shutdown, while the precise throttle lever enables smooth adjustment of engine speed.


Product Features:



  • Comprehensive control over the device – equipped with an ON/OFF switch and throttle lever for easy operation of the petrol brush cutter.

  • Durable construction – a sturdy grip made of high-quality materials ensures longevity and resistance to damage.

  • Ergonomic design – the non-slip handle allows for comfortable and precise maneuvering of the device.

  • Universal fit, 19mm tube diameter – compatible with most petrol brush cutters.

  • Long wiring harness – 80 cm of wiring ensures hassle-free connection to the brush cutter's engine.


Technical Specifications:



  • Tube diameter: 19 mm

  • Wire length: 80 cm

  • Material: Aluminum + durable plastic

  • Control elements: ON/OFF switch, throttle lever

  • Application: Right handle for petrol brush cutters

description.name: Oil and fuel mixture preparing tank 1L
description.long_desc:
The 1-liter tank for preparing a fuel and oil mixture is a practical and reliable solution for anyone who regularly uses petrol-powered equipment. With a built-in measuring scale and a clear ratio chart, mixing the correct proportions is quick and hassle-free. The flexible fuel spout with a secure closure prevents spills and allows for easy pouring, even in hard-to-reach areas.


An additional integrated oil reservoir enables precise dosing without the need for separate measuring tools, reducing the risk of incorrect fuel preparation. The entire unit is made from durable, chemical-resistant plastic, ensuring longevity and safe use.


Product Features:



  • Perfect fuel mixture preparation – a precise measuring scale on the container allows for quick and accurate fuel-to-oil ratio measurements.

  • 1L capacity – a compact and convenient tank, ideal for mixing fuel for petrol-powered devices such as brush cutters, chainsaws, and trimmers.

  • Additional oil reservoir – an integrated smaller tank allows for easy oil dosing without requiring extra measuring tools.

  • Flexible fuel spout – equipped with a flexible funnel with a closure, making fuel pouring spill-free and effortless.

  • Durable materials – made of high-quality, chemical-resistant plastic for long-lasting performance.

  • Clear ratio chart – printed on the tank, enabling quick reference for proper fuel mixture ratios (e.g., 25:1, 40:1, 50:1).


Technical Specifications:



  • Tank capacity: 1L

  • Additional oil reservoir: Yes

  • Funnel: Flexible, with a closure

  • Fuel mixture ratio chart: Yes
description.short_desc:
The 1-liter tank for preparing a fuel and oil mixture is a practical and reliable solution for anyone who regularly uses petrol-powered equipment. With a built-in measuring scale and a clear ratio chart, mixing the correct proportions is quick and hassle-free. The flexible fuel spout with a secure closure prevents spills and allows for easy pouring, even in hard-to-reach areas.


An additional integrated oil reservoir enables precise dosing without the need for separate measuring tools, reducing the risk of incorrect fuel preparation. The entire unit is made from durable, chemical-resistant plastic, ensuring longevity and safe use.


Product Features:



  • Perfect fuel mixture preparation – a precise measuring scale on the container allows for quick and accurate fuel-to-oil ratio measurements.

  • 1L capacity – a compact and convenient tank, ideal for mixing fuel for petrol-powered devices such as brush cutters, chainsaws, and trimmers.

  • Additional oil reservoir – an integrated smaller tank allows for easy oil dosing without requiring extra measuring tools.

  • Flexible fuel spout – equipped with a flexible funnel with a closure, making fuel pouring spill-free and effortless.

  • Durable materials – made of high-quality, chemical-resistant plastic for long-lasting performance.

  • Clear ratio chart – printed on the tank, enabling quick reference for proper fuel mixture ratios (e.g., 25:1, 40:1, 50:1).


Technical Specifications:



  • Tank capacity: 1L

  • Material: High-quality plastic

  • Additional oil reservoir: Yes

  • Funnel: Flexible, with a closure

  • Fuel mixture ratio chart: Yes

description.name: Telescopic rod 420cm + adaptor for inclined settings
description.long_desc:
A professional telescopic support pole is an essential tool for anyone working with construction or measurement lasers. It allows for precise and stable laser positioning at any height – up to 4.2 meters – without the need for drilling or using a tripod. Thanks to a specially designed adjustable adapter, the pole enables angled laser positioning and projecting sloped lines.


Key Product Features:




  • Maximum Height: Up to 420 cm




  • Telescopic Module Range: Adjustable from 72 to 120 cm




  • Extension Modules: 5 pieces, each 60 cm long (total extension: 300 cm)




  • Precision Mount Head: With mounting thread and angle/height adjustment




  • Easy Assembly: Pressure-mounted system with a compression base and smooth adjustment




  • Clear Scale: Markings in both centimeters and inches for quick and accurate height setup




Why Choose This Product?




  • Universal Compatibility: Suitable for most cross-line and rotary lasers




  • Versatile Working Height: From floor level up to ceiling




  • Stability and Safety: Secure and sturdy positioning in any environment




  • Modular Design: Easy to transport and store




  • Transport Bag Included: Protects the set during transport and on construction sites




Set Contents:




  • 1 × Telescopic pole (72–120 cm)




  • 5 × Extension modules (60 cm each)




  • 1 × Angled laser adapter




  • 1 × Mounting head with built-in bubble level and 1/4" thread




  • 1 × Base and pressure mounting cap




  • 1 × Branded transport bag

category.name: Garden Saws
category.path: Garden\Trimming and Cutting\Garden Saws

category_idosell.path: Garden\Trimming and Cutting\Garden Saws

description.name: SK5 36cm saw with a hook and a telescopic handle 3.3m
description.long_desc:
This premium telescopic wood saw is an indispensable tool for gardening, orchard maintenance, and green space care. It offers precise cutting performance, exceptional blade durability (SK5 steel), and allows for safe operation at height without the need for a ladder.


Functionality and Benefits:




  • Extended Reach: The telescopic pole enables access to high branches without climbing a ladder.




  • Efficient Cutting: Hardened teeth with optimized rake angle allow smooth bi-directional cutting.




  • Stable and Lightweight Design: Durable aluminum construction combines light weight with robustness.




  • End Hook: Lets you latch onto branches for better control during cutting.




  • Secure Grip: Anti-slip handle finish ensures comfort and safety during use.




Key Product Features:




  • Blade Working Length: 36 cm




  • Blade Material: Hardened high-carbon SK5 steel with hardness of 55–60 HRC




  • Tip Design: Hook for easier latching and controlled branch cutting




  • Telescopic Handle: Aluminum, adjustable from 186 to 330 cm




  • Locking System: Quick-release butterfly clamps provide rigidity and stability




  • Applications: Ideal for cutting dry and fresh branches, gardening, and orchard maintenance




Technical Specifications:


Blade Length: 360 mm (36 cm)


Blade Hardness: 55–60 HRC


Blade Material: SK5 Steel


Handle Length: 186–330 cm


Handle Material: Aluminum


Locking Mechanism: 3-stage system with butterfly clamps


Blade Tip: Hook
